column2: "The Guardian arrived at Es-Ars thanks to Clarissa's guidance."
"Dispatching the unexpected foe they were met with, they continued onward to the capital."
"However, what awaited them along their path were more than just Devil Castles."
"[Double]'s kin. The toy Darkers stood in their way as well."
"Intent on resolving this matter as quickly as possible, the Guardian hastened their advance."
"Yet they found themself faced with the cackling [Double] time and time again."
"As if it were all some sort of game. As if reliving some long-forgotten memory."
"Looks like he's waiting for us... I don't know how else to put it, but it almost feels like he knew we'd be here."
"Ah, you're here! You're here! I've been waiting!"
"Hehehe, ahahah! So many friends to play with!"
"C'mon, c'mon! Let's all play together! All the games we couldn't play, all the games we won't get to play, all of it, all of it, allll of it!"
"There's no malice. He just wants to play..."
"Hehe, ehehehehe! This is so much fun! Way more fun than I used to have!"
"Examinations are boring! I don't wanna do them anymore!"
"Don't be difficult. I know it's not your intention to break things."
"It's fine so long as they're just objects, but sooner or later you'll break a person... We don't want that."
"Tch... Fine then, Clarissa! I wanna hear about it while you do the examination!"
"Hear about what?"
"You found something super cool, didn't you? I keep hearing everyone talk about it!"
"\"The water turned into Clarissa!\" \"This is revolutionary!\" They were all really excited."
"Ah, you mean the events that took place on that planet."
"That was... Indeed, it was wondrous."
"And the knowledge we gleaned from it was equally wondrous."
"Our technology is advancing rapidly. Life expectancy should increase, and our research will progress."
"And perhaps, Flo. The secret to the power you possess...may lie within her teachings as well."
"Her? The water was a lady?"
"...It took on my appearance, so it's only natural to refer to it as a her."
"Ahh, what fun. Playing together really is the best. We should do it lots and lots more."
"Just now..."
"Was that Flo's past...?"
"<%me>? What are you talking about?"
"A vision from...Luther's time. And there you saw..."
"Flo and Clarissa's past. So that was...just before the Photoners met Xion...?"
"...I apologize, but I have no recollection of any of the events you described. It is likely that Flo does not either."
"However, there is a commonality between Flo's possession of a natural-born otherworldly power."
"And because of that, they were chosen as the Symbol. To give up their body...their mana, all for the sake of this country..."
"Let us hurry, Guardian."
